column4: something i can actually helpw ith
is there a time limit to when your account over there goes away?
I have setup an account 6 months ago, and now it isnt there any more
KujaX: yes it is probably gone by now. they send email confirmations every month
How do you keep them from deleting your account?  I want to set up an account that is going to be mission critial.
KujaX: just click the link they send you in the email every month
where did you download them from
So that is the only stipulation, is that they send you an e-mail every month?  Do you have a link on their site where they talk about that?.
